# Learning assessment

 This is code for the learning assessment. It creates `la_df` and then plots of  histogram.


```{r la_chunk}

la_df = 
  tibble (
    norm_samp = rnorm(n = 500, mean = 1),
    sample_g0 = norm_samp > 0,
    abs_v_samp = abs(norm_samp)
  )

ggplot(la_df, aes(x = abs_v_samp)) +  geom_histogram()
       
```
